Articles.Content:
This post is dedicated to the magic that is a Fun Fact.

You post a Fun Fact, to keep the fun going!

Ill start: Macroscopic single celled organisms have been found on the bottom of the ocean...

We should have reactions to the facts as well.

My reaction to your fact: That's weird...

Fact: Mud is a healthy thing for us because of the bacteria in it, so you're less likely to have allergies the more mud you explore! True story.

Somewhat true.

Fact: Mud can also carry bad diseases.

Diseases provide population control! MuwhhahahahahhHAAHAHHAHAA

Ahem- Fact: Neutron stars are so dense that one teaspoon weighs a billion tons!

Now THAT is dense

A belgian founded NYC

And i am proud to be belgian (thats not the fact, the other thing is)

It's not like I know that or anything.

Fun Fact: Shuttle Columbia couldn't be saved, but the crew might've been able to be saved in 2003.

How could they have been saved?

Fun Fact: Penguins can drink saltwater.

That's so random!

Did you know that there is a therory that there is a second star in the solar system?

Of course!

Fact: Every day, I get stuck in mud while wearing rubber boots. #Fun #NoSarcasm

That's an opinion based on my mudictionary.

Fun Fact: Columbia could've exploded on STS-1 in 1981

Good thing it didnt'

KSP is one of the first games on Steam Early Access. And the most popular.

I know.

STS-1 was launched 20 years after Vostok 1.
Fun fact: James Doohan (Scotty from Star Trek: TOS) lost his right middle finger on D-Day in WW2.
Most chickens have orange eyes, but smaller breeds can have pure black soul eating holes eyes.
In the Matrix, the passport of Neo expires on september 11, 2001!!

In the Matrix, the passport of Neo expires on september 11, 2001!!

Woah.

More Americans have been married to Kim Kardashian than have died of ebola.

Pff, even 3rd graders know that!

Fact: Mud builds the immune system indirectly.

I believe that.

fun fact: At 120 mph, a Formula One racecar produces enough downforce that it can drive upside down on the roof of a tunnel.

I believe that.

fun fact: At 120 mph, a Formula One racecar produces enough downforce that it can drive upside down on the roof of a tunnel.

*raises eyebrows* Wow....

Fact: The #1 way to fix anything is to hit it with a hammer. You will either know it is now broken or it will start working again.

Jeremy Clarkson! I would've never thought that I'd see you on here!

Fact: Nail guns are a lot easier than nailing with a hammer

Jeremy Clarkson! I would've never thought that I'd see you on here!

Fact: Nail guns are a lot easier than nailing with a hammer

You watch Top Gear (BBC) too!?

Fact: A B-25 bomber crashed into the 79th floor of the Empire State Building on July 28, 1945.

EHWHAT?!?!

Seriously, I've got no idea if that's true or not, I just googled "Random Facts"...

Never trust the... OH!

REAL FACT: The Internet is out to get you. Beware.

#LIES

Fact: I may or may not be posting this on my phone while stuck in mud.

well then...

Fun Fact: October 31 this year was 11 years since the Halloween solar flare event that affected electronics on the earth ,and in space.Also the carrington event cause telegraph poles to catch fire while also making the northern ,and southern lights visible all the way to the equator in the year of 1859.
Fun fact: In 1970, an F-106 interceptor performed a safe landing in a farmer's field after the pilot ejected.
